Package com.dacm.hexagonal.application.port.in

Interface SpaceService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpaceServiceImpl
public interface SpaceService
Interface for the Space Service.

This service layer interface manages all operations related to space entities. It provides methods to create, update, delete, and query space records. It also includes functionality to handle bulk operations and availability changes of spaces.
